sys_update_xml.name: cmn_map_page_506edb734f731200503d33718110c749
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="cmn_map_page"><cmn_map_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><center_address>Chennai, India</center_address><center_latitude/><center_longitude/><controls_size>large</controls_size><initial_zoom>2</initial_zoom><name>Property Surveys</name><overview>true</overview><refresh_on_zoom>false</refresh_on_zoom><script><![CDATA[//setup new GlideRecord query on the Tax Survey table
var gr = new GlideRecord("u_tax_survey");
//add condition for type residential
gr.addQuery('u_property_type', 'Residential');
//add condition for active incidents
gr.addActiveQuery();
//execute the query
gr.query();
 
//loop through the list of incidents returned by the query
while (gr.next()) {
 
 //create a new map item to display - linked to the current incident record
 var item = map.addItem(gr);
 //add the latitude value from the incident's location
 item.latitude = gr.location.latitude;
 //add the longitude value from the incident's location
 item.longitude = gr.location.longitude;
 //add the incident number to the dialog title
 item.dialog_title = gr.getDisplayValue();
 //link to the icon image
 item.icon = "http://maps.google.com/mapfiles/kml/pal3/icon31.png";
 //set the icon size
 item.icon_width = "16";
 item.icon_height = "16";
}

var gr2 = new GlideRecord("u_tax_survey");
//add condition for type residential
gr2.addQuery('u_property_type', 'Commercial');
//add condition for active incidents
gr2.addActiveQuery();
//execute the query
gr2.query();
 
//loop through the list of incidents returned by the query
while (gr2.next()) {
 
 //create a new map item to display - linked to the current incident record
 var item = map.addItem(gr2);
 //add the latitude value from the incident's location
 item.latitude = gr2.location.latitude;
 //add the longitude value from the incident's location
 item.longitude = gr2.location.longitude;
 //add the incident number to the dialog title
 item.dialog_title = gr2.getDisplayValue();
 //link to the icon image
 item.icon = "http://maps.google.com/mapfiles/kml/pal3/icon21.png";
 //set the icon size
 item.icon_width = "16";
 item.icon_height = "16";
}]]></script><show_device_location>true</show_device_location><suffix/><sys_class_name>cmn_map_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Manoj</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-11 07:31:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>506edb734f731200503d33718110c749</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Property Surveys</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmn_map_page_506edb734f731200503d33718110c749</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Manoj</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-11 08:25:05</sys_updated_on><type>terrain</type><type_selection>buttons</type_selection></cmn_map_page></record_update>
